Name: len(list1)
Instruction: what is the length of $list1? Respond with only the number of elements and nothing else.

Name: index(list1,index)
Instruction:
Example: What is the element of list [5,2,14,36,43] at index 2. The list is 0 indexed. Answer: 14 

What is the element of list $list1 at index $index? The list is 0 indexed. Respond with only the integer at the list position and nothing else.

Instruction: append $x to the end of the list $list1 to create a new list. Reply with only the new list. Be sure to include brackets on the outside of the new list like in the original.

Name: add(x,y)
Instruction: Add $x and $y. Reply with only the answer and nothing else.
